content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #214

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section: Events
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary:

Comment: In all of the events the FHIR Encounter resource is optional. Rather than optional it should required if exists.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #214:

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@NiklasSvenzen moved the following disposition, seconded by @wmaethner

Disposition: Will update each event description to indicate that Encounter is "Required, if exists".
Disposition Comment: Persuasive

:+1: For: 9
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
